required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of the Cytokine Hemadsorption on Sepsis
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of the Cytokine Hemadsorption on the Clinical Progression and Mortality of Intensive Care Patients With Sepsis

brief_summary.textblock: In this prospective study, we aimed to compare the laboratory and clinical results of cytokine hemadsorption as an immunomodulation therapy in ICU patients diagnosed with sepsis or septic shock.

arm_group.arm_group_label: ICU patients diagnosed with sepsis or septic shock
arm_group.description: compare the laboratory and clinical results of cytokine hemadsorption as an immunomodulation therapy in ICU patients diagnosed with sepsis or septic shock.

intervention.description: the laboratory and clinical results of cytokine hemadsorption as an immunomodulation therapy in ICU patients diagnosed with sepsis or septic shock.
intervention.arm_group_label: ICU patients diagnosed with sepsis or septic shock

study_pop.textblock: In this one-centered study, we prospectively analyzed the outcomes and laboratory findings of 39 patients diagnosed with sepsis from 01 Jan 2020 to 30 December 2020 hospitalized in ICU.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- the patients were the available data of clinical and laboratory diagnosis of sepsis and septic shock
- detection of gram-negative bacterial agent in blood or sputum culture.
- patients who had the shock symptoms such as hypotension, tachycardia or fever during the course of sepsis.
Exclusion Criteria:
- had uncontrolled hemorrhage,
- diagnosed with cardiac failure at stage 4 or renal failure at stage 4 or hepatic liver failure at stage 4
- cancer at the end stage or admitted with acute coronary syndrome.

reference.citation: Bahar İ, Oksuz H, Şenoğlu N, Demirkiran H, Aydoğan M, Tomak Y, Çömez M, Bayrakçı S, Gönüllü E, Berktaş M. Compliance With the Surviving Sepsis Campaign Bundle: A Multicenter Study From Turkey. Cureus. 2021 May 12;13(5):e14989. doi: 10.7759/cureus.14989.

results_reference.citation: Houschyar KS, Pyles MN, Rein S, Nietzschmann I, Duscher D, Maan ZN, Weissenberg K, Philipps HM, Strauss C, Reichelt B, Siemers F. Continuous hemoadsorption with a cytokine adsorber during sepsis - a review of the literature. Int J Artif Organs. 2017 May 29;40(5):205-211. doi: 10.5301/ijao.5000591. Epub 2017 May 19. Review.

Bonavia A, Groff A, Karamchandani K, Singbartl K. Clinical Utility of Extracorporeal Cytokine Hemoadsorption Therapy: A Literature Review. Blood Purif. 2018;46(4):337-349. doi: 10.1159/000492379. Epub 2018 Sep 3. Review.
